pages.text: Basins can hold fluids and item stacks, and other machines can interact with their contents.

$(l)Automatin' Basin$()$(br2)Basins can be given a Filter setting, which specifies what recipes they will create when other machines interact with them. They can also automatically output contents to $(l:logistics/age1_andesite/depot)Depots$(), $(l:fluids/age1_andesite/fluid_pipe)Pipes$(), or $(l:logistics/age1_andesite/mechanical_belt)Belts$() below their sides.
